snippet: Hagai Amir, the brother of the killer of Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin, was released from prison on Friday after serving 16 years for helping to plan the 1995 assassination.
abstract: Hagai Amir is released from Israeli prison after serving 16 years for helping his brother Yigal Amir plan the 1995 assassination of Israeli Prime Min Yitzhak Rabin.
lead_paragraph: Hagai Amir, the brother of the killer of Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin, was released from prison on Friday after serving 16 years for helping to plan the 1995 assassination.

headline.seo: Israel: Hagai Amir, Brother of Rabin’s Killer, Is Freed
headline.main: Israel: Brother of Rabin’s Killer Is Freed After Serving His Sentence
headline.print_headline: Israel: Brother of Rabin’s Killer Is Freed After Serving His Sentence
